changes.change:
NEW FEATURES:
•Added -c, --saccuracy, --caccuracy (>iOS 13.4) and few others


FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•Changed --exportplist to --export-plist for readibility's sake
•Fine tunings

NEW FEATURES:
•Added -g, --gpx for gpx file simulations (moving location simulation)
Added -fsglpdr and more flags

FIXES & IMPROVEMENTS:
•None
